label: Simple state machine with data object

name: Settings
info:
Persist settings in a flat file.

If msg.clearAll is set to true, the settings are truncated.

Sending a topic of "get" will return the property you've named in the payload.

Any other topic will be treated as a property and the payload will be saved to the settings file.

name: MDMC - Motorized Devices Management and Control
ELMC - Efficient Lighting Management and Control
EHMC - Efficient HVAC Management and Control
ASMC - Alarm System Management and Control
Logo / Clock
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();

        logo.src = '/logo2_UA.png'
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        div1.append(logo);

        //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '5px';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleString());
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
            toolbar.append(div2);
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

sending topic "toggleState" toggles between the two states
sending topic "reset" will set the state machine to its initial state
any other topic will trigger a transition
by sending a JSON object as payload you can add data to the state
sending topic "run" will trigger the machine which is stopped 5 seconds later

GA -  MAP REPRESENTATION AND SETUP OF GA
info:
This example shows how to embed the Worldmap 
into a template node within the `node-red-dashboard`

The first flow creates a dashboard button that 
generates a randon position, with the required 
icon, and passes that to the worldmap. The
map is configured to automatically pan to the
position of any point that arrives.

The second flow initialise the dashboard template
with the initial map and sets it to a more square shape
by adjusting the height.

name: F GeoA RUnitDB INSERT
func:
var nRUiDB= global.get('nRUiDB')||[];

global.set('nRUiDB',msg.payload[0]);
nRUiDB=global.get('nRUiDB');

var SQLInsert={
    "topic" : "INSERT INTO RUnitDB(ID,Category,Description,DateCreated,DateModified," +
    "Topology,Location,Address,Inhabitant_1_ID,Inhabitant_2_ID,Inhabitant_3_ID," +
    "Inhabitant_4_ID,Inhabitant_5_ID,Inhabitant_6_ID,MapURL) VALUES (" + 
    nRUiDB.ID + ", " + 
    "\"" + nRUiDB.Category + "\"" + ", " +  
    "\"" + nRUiDB.Description + "\"" + ", " + 
    "\"" + nRUiDB.DateCreated + "\"" + ", " + 
    "\"" + nRUiDB.DateModified + "\"" + ", " + 
    "\"" + nRUiDB.Topology + "\"" + ", " + 
    "\"" + nRUiDB.Location + "\""  + ", " + 
    "\"" + nRUiDB.Address + "\"" + ", " + 
    nRUiDB.Inhabitant_1_ID + ", " +
    nRUiDB.Inhabitant_2_ID + ", " +
    nRUiDB.Inhabitant_3_ID + ", " + 
    nRUiDB.Inhabitant_4_ID + ", " + 
    nRUiDB.Inhabitant_5_ID + ", " +
    nRUiDB.Inhabitant_6_ID + ", " + 
    "\"" + nRUiDB.MapURL + "\"" + ")"
}

nRUiDB={payload:nRUiDB};

return [SQLInsert,nRUiDB];

name: F SELECT LAST RESID
func:
var SQLSELECTLAST={"topic" : "SELECT * FROM RUnitDB WHERE ID = ( SELECT MAX( ID ) FROM RUnitDB )"};
return SQLSELECTLAST;

name: stuff
format:
<style>
  .filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}
  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>

name: F BUnit_DB Number of Records
F Show a New Building Unit
F BUnit_DB Select Record to UPDATE
func:
var ListBU=msg.payload;
var index=ListBU.Selected;

var SQLUPDATE={"topic" : "UPDATE BUnit_DB SET " +
    "ID_BU=" + ListBU.BU[index].ID_BU + ", " +
    "ID_GA=" + ListBU.BU[index].ID_GA + ", " +
    "Category=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].Category + "\"" + ", " + 
    "Description=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].Description + "\"" + ", " + 
    "FloorsAboveGround=" + "\"" + parseInt(ListBU.BU[index].FloorsAboveGround) + "\""  + ", " + 
    "FloorsBelowGround=" + "\"" + parseInt(ListBU.BU[index].FloorsBelowGround) + "\""  + ", " +
    "Street=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].Street + "\""  + ", " + 
    "DoorNumber=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].DoorNumber + "\""  + ", " + 
    "AreaLocality=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].AreaLocality + "\""  + ", " + 
    "ZipPostCode=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].ZipPostCode + "\""  + ", " +
    "GPS_Lat=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].GPS_Lat + "\"" + ", " + 
    "GPS_Lon=" + "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].GPS_Lon + "\"" + ", " + 
    "OtherInfo= "+ "\"" + ListBU.BU[index].OtherInfo + "\"" +

    "WHERE ID_BU=" + ListBU.BU[index].ID_BU    
};

return [SQLUPDATE, msg];
